comments:
- I start my debug session
- Resume 
- The target is now running

There are two types of terminate: #1 top level tree terminate and terminate on the 
thread. 

Results when issuing a type #1 terminate:

- stuck session 
- it is possible to remove the stuck session by right clicking + Terminate &
Remove on "Debugger Process"
